items.title: The Economist* on the speed of AI take-off
items.summary: The Economist reports on the slow pace of AI adoption, with the potential for a workerless economy in the future. Economist Tyler Cowen believes that despite the rapid advancements in AI technology, its impact on the economy will be gradual.
